abi: function addEmployee(string _name, uint256 _age, uint256 _salary, bool _contractor, string _country, address _payAddress, bool _isHr)
function addTaxRate(string country, string[] names, uint256[] lowerLimits, uint256[] upperLimits, uint256[] taxValues, string[] taxTypes)
function contractorHours(uint256) view returns (uint256 dateReported, uint256 hoursReported, address contractorAddress)
function employees(address) view returns (string name, uint256 age, uint256 salary, bool contractor, string country, bool isHr)
function getContractorHours(address _address, uint256 startDate, uint256 endDate) view returns (uint256)
function getContractorHoursByMonth(uint256 contractorId, uint256 year, uint256 month) view returns (uint256)

function getEmployees() view returns (tuple(string name, uint256 age, uint256 salary, bool contractor, string country, bool isHr)[], address[])
function getFilteredExpenses(uint256 startDate, uint256 endDate) view returns (address[], string[], uint256[])
function getHoursWorked(uint256 date, address _address) view returns (uint256)
function getMonthlyExpenses() view returns (address[], string[], uint256[])
function getPaymentStatus() view returns (uint256[], uint256[], bool[])
function getStartOfMonthTimestamp(uint256 year, uint256 month) pure returns (uint256)
function getTaxRate(string country) view returns (tuple(string name, uint256 lowerLimit, uint256 upperLimit, uint256 taxValue, string taxType)[])
function getThisMonthsSalaryInfo(uint256 startDate, uint256 endDate) view returns (uint256)
function updateEmployee(address _employeeAddress, string _name, uint256 _age, uint256 _salary, bool _contractor, string _country, bool _isHr)
